article.title: Northrop to Integrate BLOS onto E-11A Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Space and Missile Systems Corporation, San Diego, California, is being awarded a $20,170,782 contract modification to integrate beyond line of sight capability (BLOS) onto an E-11A aircraft.Â The contracting activity is Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts.
